analysis.key_quote: They are making America Desperate & Cruel & not Caring! Without Kindness & Goodness. Turning America into an Ugly Selfish not Caring Racist Country!
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong opposition to the current administration, highlighting concerns about its impact on society and governance. The themes of politicization and a lack of care for the public are evident, indicating a clear stance against the proposed rule.
